Question: Kepler Exploration Robotics Co. Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kepler Exploration Robot Co., Ltd

Product: Kepler Forerunner series humanoid robot

- Stands 178cm tall, weighs 85kg
- Features 12 degrees of freedom in its hands and a total of 40 degrees of freedom throughout its body
- Utilizes planetary roller screw actuator and rotary actuator technology
- Intended for industries such as manufacturing, logistics, education
- Priced at around US$30,000 for international customers
- Equipped with NEBULA system for cognitive abilities and in-house R&D capabilities
- Expected to enter mass production and begin shipping in the third quarter of 2024
